Reason: The _transientMode configuration option in the prevayler software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value significantly affects system performance. When _transientMode is enabled, the system stores data in memory only, leading to faster execution times but higher memory consumption. On the other hand, disabling _transientMode results in data being written to disk, which may slow down execution but reduce memory usage. Therefore, the value of _transientMode has a notable impact on both execution time and memory consumption, making it a performance-sensitive configuration option.
